name: Clico Token
description:
The native token of Clico, $XCL, allows clients to purchase digital services and assets with cryptocurrency. Customers can pay with $XCL, as well as other popular tokens, such as BNB, CAKE, USDT, and more.
 Additionally, clients who use or HODL the $XCL token for purchases on CLICO can earn special discounts and rewards, such as NFTs and airdrops.
